mapper.select: SELECT a.iboard, a.icategory, a.isubject, b.nm, a.title, a.created_at createdAt FROM board a INNER JOIN user b ON a.iuser = b.iuser WHERE a.public_fl = 'Y' AND a.isubject = #{subject}
SELECT a.iboard, a.isubject, a.title, a.contents, b.nm, a.created_at createdAt FROM board a INNER JOIN user b ON a.iuser = b.iuser WHERE a.iboard = #{iboard}
